text: MxPx is an American pop punk band from Bremerton, Washington. It was formed in 1992. == Musical style and influences == MxPx's influences include Descendents, Nirvana, The Clash, Green Day, Minor Threat, Samiam, The Replacements, Foo Fighters, All, Melvins, NOFX, Suicidal Tendencies and The Vandals. == Band members == * Mike Herrera - lead vocals, bass guitar (1992-present) * Yuri Ruley - drums, percussion (1992-present) * Tom Wisniewski - lead guitar, backing vocals (1995-present) * Chris Adkins - rhythm guitar, backing vocals (2016-present) == Other websites == * Category:1992 establishments in the United States Category:American punk bands Category:Musical groups established in 1992 Category:Pop punk bands
title: MxPx
